name: Rolling Beats (Banana Slip, Pactonito, Ganfornike, jujamalouu, Coexito)
name_original: Rolling Beats (Banana Slip, Pactonito, Ganfornike, jujamalouu, Coexito)
description:
Rolling Beats!

Rolling Beats is a rhythm-based videogame where you control Tina Rulles, a skater whose dream is to become the first person to skate in Saturn's rings!

Skate accross the son to achieve the maximum score and stay at the top of the leaderboard!

Controls:
